title: Where is the mailroom?
content: The mailroom is located on the bottom (first) floor of the Union Building.

title: How to forward mail?
content: To forward mail, fill out the forwarding form available at the mailroom or on the RPI website.

title: What are the dining hall hours?
content: The dining hall hours vary by location. Commons and Sage dining halls are open from 7 AM to 9 PM on weekdays and 9 AM to 7 PM on weekends.

title: Where can I use my meal plan?
content: Meal plans can be used at Commons, Sage, Blitman Dining Hall, and various retail locations across campus.

title: What is Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute?
content: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) is a private research university located in Troy, New York, known for its engineering, science, and technology programs.

title: What resources are available for academic support?
content: RPI offers various academic support resources including the Advising and Learning Assistance Center (ALAC), tutoring services, and writing assistance.

title: Where can I find the shuttle schedule?
content: The shuttle schedule is available on the RPI website and at shuttle stops around campus.

title: How do I get a parking permit?
content: Parking permits can be obtained through the Parking and Transportation office located in the Public Safety Building.

title: What should I bring to my dorm?
content: A recommended packing list includes bedding, toiletries, a desk lamp, and personal items. Check the RPI website for a full list of suggested items.

title: How do I report a maintenance issue?
content: Maintenance issues can be reported through the online maintenance request form on the RPI website or by contacting the residence hall staff.
